author: davsclaus
msg: CAMEL-1631: Added properties component for property placeholder support in endpoint uris natively in camel-core. No need to use Spring for that anymore.

author: markt
msg: Add a test case for TimerThread thread/memory leaks on reload as I have some ideas on how to safely terminate those threads
